subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: The United States will play its Davis Cup quarterfinal against Serbia this weekend in Boise, Idaho, a city with one of the highest participation rates per capita for U.S.T.A. leagues and tournaments.
snippet: The United States will play its Davis Cup quarterfinal against Serbia this weekend in Boise, Idaho, a city with one of the highest participation rates per capita for U.S.T.A. leagues and tournaments.
